item.description:
Kid's Karaoke at the BBC

Sarah has wanted to have her friends out to sing. So here we go.

The BBC has a good menu from Apps, Pizza, sandwiches, fish, steak and more.

You don't have to buy anything if you don't want. Just come for some fun.

The only thing it will cost you is gas and tire wear....

Please keep your RSVP up to date because they will bring in more staff if we have a larger group.

No-shows will be flogged in the town square...
item.how_to_find_us: 1st room on the right as you enter the back door.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kid's Karaoke at the Cedarville BBC
